nodes.text: The Scofti were a sentient species that underwent frequent changes in leaders and governmental regimes. The transitions were often violent, or motivated by the threat of violence. New leaders would reorganize their palace, often taking pleasure in destroying the items of their predecessor. As such, Scofti artisans made such items intentionally fragile. At some point, the Scofti entered into marginal contact with the Chiss. Twenty years into that contact, the Chiss Mitth'raw'nuruodo analyzed a set of Scofti tableware from a regime one hundred years prior, deducing the society's nature before consulting Chiss records.
